topic.title: Using Content Fusion Within Oxygen XML Editor/Author

keywords.indexterm: Using Content Fusion in Oxygen XML Editor/Author

body.p: An Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on is available that can be installed to integrate Oxygen Content Fusion into Oxygen XML Editor/Author. This allows authors to create review tasks directly from Oxygen XML Editor/Author and integrate proposed changes. Content Fusion is a flexible, intuitive collaboration platform designed to adapt to virtually any type of workflow that a collaborative team may use for their documentation review process.
For more information about using Content Fusion in Oxygen XML Editor/Author, see the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector Add-on Documentation.
